title: how to decline or give back riots gift
body:
Hi

Its a new season so riot gifted me an unwanted champion. It was nice of them except I play mainly ARAM and did not want that particular champion. How do i give back riot's gift? or decline it and it didnt give me an option.

replies.body: Kayle won't take it personally that you don't want her in your champion pool, so reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) **after **you've received your gifts.  We'll be able to help out after a brief verification process.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
